movie.title: A Father's Secret
movie.description_intro: Carrie Evans, a beautiful young attorney with aspirations to become partner like her fiancee Steven Riggs, learns some disturbing facts about her family and her boss Caswell Foxx as she researches a big case. She becomes so entrenched in the case that it causes her to risk her career, freedom and her relationships.
movie.description_full: Carrie Evans, a beautiful young attorney with aspirations to become partner like her fiancee Steven Riggs, learns some disturbing facts about her family and her boss Caswell Foxx as she researches a big case. She becomes so entrenched in the case that it causes her to risk her career, freedom and her relationships.

movies.title: Dark Passage
movies.summary: Bogart plays a man convicted of murdering his wife who escapes from prison in order to prove his innocence. Bogart finds that his features are too well known, and is forced to seek some illicit backroom plastic surgery. The entire pre-knife part of the film is shot from a Bogart's-eye-view, with us seeing the fugitive for the first time as he starts to recuperate from the operation in the apartment of a sympathetic young artist (played by Bacall) for whom he soon finds affection. But what he's really after is revenge.

movies.title: Sonny Capone
movies.summary: When Sonny Capone, Dublin-born head of the Mafia in Rome, hears that his son Luke has been murdered in Dublin, he returns home to kill everyone in sight. Pitted against Dublin's notorious drug baron, James 'The Predator' Barrett, Sonny summons his Mafia gang to Dublin, where a final showdown will leave just one blood-drenched man standing.

movies.title: The Next Day
movies.summary: A man and woman have a one night stand. The unexpected consequences of such a union change their lives.
movies.description_full: A man and woman have a one night stand. The unexpected consequences of such a union change their lives.
movies.synopsis: A man and woman have a one night stand. The unexpected consequences of such a union change their lives.

movies.title: Beckman
movies.summary: A contract killer becomes the reverend of an LA church until a cult leader and his minions kidnap his daughter. Blinded by vengeance, he cuts a bloody path across the city. The only thing that can stop him is his newfound faith.
